SHIP_INITIAL_WEAPONSFREE_DELAY		10.0	// Seconds until weapons become active.
SHIP_PURSUE_CEILING                 800.0	// m above or below the plane for pursue stance

// Net values generated by specific ship section combos have lower
// limits given by these values.
//
SHIP_MIN_ROTSPEED					5.0		// deg/s
SHIP_MIN_SPEED						10.0	// m/s

// Startpoint rebalancing (rotation) occurs so that defender spawns are neither directly in line with
// or too far removed from the enemy approach.
SHIP_STARTPOINT_ROTATE_BY			60.0	// degrees offset where reinforcements start
SHIP_STARTPOINT_HIVER_OFFSET		200.0	// 200 meters above the plane

SHIP_MAX_VIEWDIST					10000.0	// 4000 (can be overridden by 'viewdist' in ship sections)
SHIP_MAX_LIGHTS_VIEWDIST			2000.0	// 400
SHIP_MAX_EFFECT_VIEWDIST			2000.0	// 1000

// Traffic priorities, who goes around who.  Less priority goes around higher priority in general.
SHIP_TRAFFIC_PRI_DE					25
SHIP_TRAFFIC_PRI_CR					100
SHIP_TRAFFIC_PRI_DN					200
SHIP_TRAFFIC_PRI_DEFPLAT			300	// Want ships to move around to avoid collision.
SHIP_TRAFFIC_PRI_BIOMIS				5
SHIP_TRAFFIC_PRI_GATE				500
SHIP_TRAFFIC_PRI_ASHUTTLE			7

SHIP_INERTIALCANNON_HIT_DRAG				0.1		// Translates as percent/100 amount of drag overall, added with each hit, up to 1.00
SHIP_INERTIALCANNON_DRAG_DISSIPATION_RATE	0.0167	// Undoes this much inertial drag per second (so 0.05/3-sec=0.0167, would undo one 5% hit in 3 seconds)
SHIP_INERTIALCANNON_DRAG_MAX				1.0		// saturates at this point
SHIP_KELVINIC_DAMAGE_MODIFIER				0.05	// Damage taken increases by percent/100 for every kelvinic weapon hit
